thread.title: Monroe and Moroccan Cannon Outshine Their Famous Mom on the Red Carpet

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Monroe and Moroccan Cannon Outshine Their Famous Mom on the Red Carpet
text:
Mariah Carey and Her Kids at The Lego Batman Movie Premiere Monroe and Moroccan Cannon Outshine Their Famous Mom on the Red Carpet February 4, 2017   Monroe and Moroccan Cannon Outshine Their Famous Mom on the Red Carpet 
Mariah Carey had the best dates to the LA premiere of The Lego Batman Movie on Saturday: her 5-year-old twins , Monroe and Moroccan. The doting mom held on to her little ones' hands as they made their way down the red carpet, where Monroe waved to photographers and Moroccan flashed his sweet smile. Before the premiere, Mariah shared an adorable Instagram snap of her and Monroe , and captioned it, "On our way to the #LEGOBatmanMovie premiere. See you soon! üòò‚ù§üé¨" 
Earlier this week, Beyonc√© announced that she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins , and if anyone knows what she's about to go through, it's Mariah. The "I Don't" singer reached out to congratulate Beyonc√© in the comment section of her pregnancy announcement photo on Wednesday, writing, "Congrats Bey and Jay!!! I'm so happy for you both. Having twins is the most incredible experience ever! Love, Mariah and the twins." Related:
